ygData.subject: Re: question
ygData.msgSnippet: So you wish to try out a Rogue aye! Well that is a good choice. Rogues can become skilled in poison making and applying the poisons to their weapons
ygData.messageBody:
So you wish to try out a Rogue aye! Well that
is<br>a good choice. Rogues can become skilled in
poison<br>making and applying the poisons to their weapons
they<br>also receive a highly effective skill known
as<br>backstab. Pretty much like sneaking up on the prey
and<br>slitting its throat.If its hand to hand your after<br>the
Monk will be your path but be forewarned they
may<br>have a hard hit and many intriguing moves but
they<br>also have a low weight limit for they must be
nimble<br>and agile on their journeys.<br><br>As
for jumping.<br>There is no combat form of jumping
but you can use jump<br>to get ahead of whatever prey
has decided it wants<br>you to be the prey. You can
jump as you run away from<br>the beast that has
exposed your bum to the elements<br>so as not to loose a
cheek.
